question: Raffaele Bergamasco, who has been appointed Performance Director for women's boxing in India, hails from which country?
explanation: Italian coach Raffaele Bergamasco has been appointed Performance Director for senior women\'s boxing. He is behind India\'s best ever medal haul at the recently-concluded AIBA Women\'s Youth Boxing Championship 2017. India enjoyed a gold rush at the World Women\'s Youth Boxing Championships 2017 in Guwahati with the country\'s pugilists grabbing five top positions to finish overall champions for the first time.
